barometer_absorbed_humidity.name: Barometer has Absorbed Humidity
solutions: Remove the barometer. Let it dry inside a sealed bag with silica gel packs for at least 24 hours before reinstalling.
If problem persists, seek to replace barometer.

IMU_overheated.name: Inertial Measurement Unit (IMU) Overheated
solutions: Wait for the Avionics Board to cool down.
If problem persists, seek to replace the Avionics Board.

radar_omni_bearing_damaged.name: Omnidirectional Radar Bearing is Damaged
solutions: If replacement of the omnidirectional radar's bearing is not available, replace entire radar module.
